Starscream

Starscream dropped his jaw at the news. What was happening? Phobia 
was killed, and now an Alliance? Why would Black Arachnia do this? 
She had her own group to rule and was a power here. She must have 
some alterior motive. He would be the one keeping the close eye on 
this Cyber Claw, and Black Arachnia. If any of them did something 
that looked remotly like Treason, they are as good as dead.

______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon watched Slayer go off, or tried to because he was in cloak, 
when suddenly the moniter on the Tamer went off. Something was wrong. 
It wasn't that he was getting no readings. If that happened than the 
chip would have been removed. Now the readings were changing every 
mili-second, like they had been scrambled. But there was no sign of 
any sort of device like that on the Ark.

"Damn it! They must have moved her," he said, sending a comm to 
Slayer, "Come back. They have moved her. We must re-think our 
strategy." Prebon pondered a bit, but than sent a message back.

"Stay there, actually. Blaze is going to come out yo you with the 
extra cloaking device. I want you to sneak up and place it on the 
Wolf bot, and than knock him out, but don't kill him. We'll take him 
back to base and probe his memory for where they took her."

Blaze hit her jet pack and tried to find Slayer.
